Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Servo valve spool sticking. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Actuator System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 03/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni
